sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './ContactUs.css'; const ContactUs = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('faq'); const [activeFaq, setActiveFaq] = useState(null); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', category: '', message: '' }); const faqs = [ { id: 1, question: 'How do I check my eligibility for government schemes?', answer: 'You can use our AI-powered chatbot "YojnaMitra" to check your eligibility. Simply answer a few questions about your age, state, income, category, and occupation, and the chatbot will show you all schemes you qualify for.' }, { id: 2, question: 'Is registration mandatory to view schemes?', answer: 'No, you can browse all schemes without registration. However, registering allows you to save schemes, receive personalized notifications, and track your applications.' }, { id: 3, question: 'How often is scheme information updated?', answer: 'We update scheme information regularly from official government sources. New schemes are added as soon as they are announced, and existing schemes are reviewed monthly for accuracy.' }, { id: 4, question: 'Can I apply for schemes directly through this portal?', answer: 'JanSahayak provides comprehensive information and directs you to official government portals for applications. We do not process applications directly but guide you through the entire process.' }, { id: 5, question: 'What documents are typically required for scheme applications?', answer: 'Common documents include Aadhaar Card, Income Certificate, Caste Certificate (if applicable), Bank Account details, and residence proof. Specific requirements vary by scheme and are listed in each scheme\'s details page.' }, { id: 6, question: 'How can I get help if I face issues during application?', answer: 'You can contact our helpline at 7355076036 or email us at someshsingh2206@gmail.com. Our support team is available Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM to assist you.' } ]; const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert('Thank you for your message. We will get back to you within 24-48 hours.'); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', category: '', message: '' }); }; return (
